akn:content.akn:p:
§ 200308. Principal office The principal office of the corporation shall be in Trenton, New Jersey, or another place decided by the council of administration. However, the activities of the corporation are not confined to the place where the principal office is located but may be conducted in the District of Columbia and throughout the States, territories, and possessions of the United States. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1454.)
